releaseNotes:
Version 11.6.0 (Release Date: June 9, 2014) 
Enhancements
## Linux: Added support for newer kernel versions, up to v3.14.4. 
## WinDriver 64-?bit (.NET): Added support for DriverWizard code generation of 32-?bit .NET applications on 64-?bit platforms. 
## ISA on Windows (.NET): Added the ITEM_MEMORY_64BIT item type, for accessing physical 64-?bit memory addresses, to the .NET API. 
Fixes
## PCI on Linux 64-?bit: Fixed memory corruption when running a 32-?bit application with a 64-?bit Kernel PlugIn driver (issue since v10.3.0). 
## Windows: Fixed a rare memory leak. 
## PCI on Windows 64-?bit: Fixed mapping of 64-?bit physical addresses (issue since v10.4.0). 
## PCI: Fixed synchronization of the lost-interrupts count returned in the WD_INTERRUPT dwLost field. 
## USB on Windows: Fixed occasional OS crashes when using short timeouts (usually smaller than one second) for single-blocking transfers. 
## Kernel PlugIn PCI on Linux: Fixed the return value of the kp_interlocked_exchange() function to return the old Kernel PlugIn interlocked counter value and not the new value.
title: WinDriver .Net dlls
